carousel.title: Do you know how to use any of these Javascript frameworks?

explanation.subtitle: If you have clarity on their main concepts, you can practically use all 3 frameworks
explanation.description: Having a Javascript foundation makes it easier to learn the basic concepts of each framework. Each framework has its own syntax and structures, but based on these similarities you can make translations between them without losing their internal logic. For example, if you have a function in React, you can translate it to Vue or Angular without losing its functionality. This allows you to take advantage of each framework's benefits and use the one that best fits your project.

example.title: For example
example.description: The basic structure of a simple component looks like this in each of the frameworks:
